content: Soaks are more common than the Drinks for your Gourds, and can often be found throughout the game’s chapters. So, you will need to head off the beaten path to find them all.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Soaks.md', within the main section titled 'Soaks'.
The content is as follows:
Soaks are more common than the Drinks for your Gourds, and can often be found throughout the game’s chapters. So, you will need to head off the beaten path to find them all.
